column4: Hey, sometimes, in firefox, .exe and zip are registered to notepad. Is there anyway to change them to their programs?
what is the output of:  lsb_release -sc
what is the output of:  lsb_release -sc
is firefox running via wine?
cool, ok lets see
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1860433
It's associated with Wine and Archive Manager, for exe and zip respectively, however, they show up as unknown in FF and open in notepad
doesn't firefox have its own associations...?
Lemme check....
Yes, but both are set to "Always ask". It asks, but only gives me notepad as an option
link is bad
do you use the dropbox app in Ubuntu?
Yes, I uploaded it directly from Shutter, however. Here's a new link
in the public folder, you can right click a file and under the dropbox entry you can click to copy the public address
drop down the box and click 'other app...'
It's a Find File, I'm assuming I'm going to have to find Wine and Archive manager files manually?
wine will be /usr/bin/wine
It opens in wine once, but then, with a new download, it says notepad again.
download the file.Right click the file and change association there
It's just awkward if I want the file only once, but I guess that's my only option. Thanks anway.
http://www.ehow.com/how_2033405_manage-file-type.html  may help
http://askubuntu.com/questions/20015/firefox-application-associations-not-working   maybe
